mapper.select: SELECT SB.SBR_UUID, SB.SBR_TITLE, M.MEM_NAME, TO_CHAR(SB.SBR_REGDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') SBR_REGDATE FROM RC_SYSBOARD SB, RC_MEMBER M WHERE SB.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND SB.SBR_NOTICEYN = 'Y' AND SB.SBR_DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY SBR_REFER DESC, SBR_STEP

SELECT SB.SBR_UUID, SB.SBR_TITLE, M.MEM_NAME, SB.SBR_REGDATE FROM RC_SYSBOARD SB, RC_MEMBER M WHERE SB.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND SB.SBR_NOTICEYN = 'Y' AND SB.SBR_DELYN = 'N'
AND SB.SBR_TITLE LIKE '%${sbr_title}%'
ORDER BY SBR_REFER DESC, SBR_STEP

SELECT SB.SBR_UUID, SB.SBR_TITLE, M.MEM_NAME, TO_CHAR(SB.SBR_REGDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') SBR_REGDATE, SB.SBR_SCRYN FROM RC_SYSBOARD SB, RC_MEMBER M WHERE SB.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND SBR_DELYN = 'N' AND SBR_NOTICEYN = 'N' ORDER BY SBR_REFER DESC, SBR_STEP

SELECT SB.SBR_UUID, SB.SBR_TITLE, M.MEM_NAME, TO_CHAR(SB.SBR_REGDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') SBR_REGDATE, SB.SBR_SCRYN FROM RC_SYSBOARD SB, RC_MEMBER M WHERE SB.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND SBR_DELYN = 'N' AND SBR_NOTICEYN = 'N'
AND SB.SBR_TITLE LIKE '%${sbr_title}%'
ORDER BY SBR_REFER DESC, SBR_STEP

SELECT SB.SBR_UUID, SB.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NAME, TO_CHAR(SB.SBR_REGDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') SBR_REGDATE, SB.SBR_TITLE, SB.SBR_CONTENT, SB.SBR_REFER FROM RC_SYSBOARD SB, RC_MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_ID = SB.MEM_ID AND SB.SBR_SCRYN = 'N' AND SBR_UUID = #{sbr_uuid}

SELECT SB.SBR_UUID, SB.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NAME, TO_CHAR(SB.SBR_REGDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') SBR_REGDATE, SB.SBR_TITLE, SB.SBR_CONTENT, SB.SBR_REFER FROM RC_MEMBER M, RC_SYSBOARD SB WHERE M.MEM_ID = SB.MEM_ID AND SB.SBR_SCRYN = 'Y' AND SB.SBR_UUID = #{sbr_uuid} AND SB.SBR_PW = #{sbr_pw}

SELECT SB.SBR_UUID, SB.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NAME, TO_CHAR(SB.SBR_REGDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') SBR_REGDATE, SB.SBR_TITLE, SB.SBR_CONTENT FROM RC_MEMBER M, RC_SYSBOARD SB WHERE M.MEM_ID = SB.MEM_ID AND SB.SBR_UUID = #{sbr_uuid}
SELECT SA.SATT_SEQ, SA.SATT_NAME, SA.SATT_SIZE, SA.SATT_RNAME, SA.SATT_PATH FROM RC_SYSATTACH SA WHERE SA.SBR_UUID = #{sbr_uuid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RC_SYSBOARD (SBR_UUID, MEM_ID, SBR_TITLE, SBR_CONTENT, SBR_SCRYN, SBR_PW, SBR_NOTICEYN, SBR_REFER, SBR_REGDATE) VALUES (#{sbr_uuid}, #{mem_id}, #{sbr_title}, #{sbr_content}, #{sbr_scryn}, #{sbr_pw}, 'N', (SELECT NVL(MAX(SBR_REFER)+1, 1) FROM RC_SYSBOARD) , SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO RC_SYSATTACH (SATT_SEQ, SBR_UUID, SATT_NAME, SATT_SIZE, SATT_RNAME, SATT_PATH) VALUES (SYSATTACH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sbr_uuid}, #{satt_name}, #{satt_size}, #{satt_rname}, #{satt_path})
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_SYSBOARD SET SBR_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE SBR_UUID = #{ sbr_uuid }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RC_SYSATTACH WHERE SBR_UUID = #{ sbr_uuid }
